trans-unit.source: The exception that is thrown when a configuration error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod når det oppstod en konfigurasjonsfeil.

trans-unit.source: The ConfigurationErrorsException exception is thrown when any error occurs while configuration information is being read or written.
trans-unit.target: Den ConfigurationErrorsException unntak når det oppstår en feil mens konfigurasjonsinformasjon lese eller skrive.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En melding som forklarer hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the information to deserialize.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som inneholder informasjon deserialisering.

trans-unit.source: Contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.

trans-unit.source: The current type is not a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"></xref> or a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende er ikke en <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationException"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En melding som forklarer hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Unntak som forårsaket dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En melding som forklarer hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En melding som forklarer hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En melding som forklarer hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Det interne unntaket som forårsaket dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En melding som forklarer hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Det interne unntaket som forårsaket dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En melding som forklarer hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Banen til konfigurasjonsfilen som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Linjenummeret i konfigurasjonsfilen for som <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av en <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: A message that describes why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En melding som forklarer hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The inner exception that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Det interne unntaket som forårsaket dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Banen til konfigurasjonsfilen som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Linjenummeret i konfigurasjonsfilen for som <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Gets a description of why this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter en beskrivelse av hvorfor denne konfigurasjonsunntak ble registrert.

trans-unit.source: The BareMessage property does not contain the name of the configuration file or the line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen BareMessage inneholder ikke navnet på filen eller linjenummeret for som <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>unntak oppstod.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>

trans-unit.source: If you want a message that contains the name of the configuration file and the line number, along with the message, use the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil bruke en melding som inneholder navnet på filen for konfigurasjon og linjenummer sammen med meldingen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.Message%2A>

trans-unit.source: A description of why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse av hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of errors that detail the reasons this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter en rekke feil som detalj årsakene dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: The Errors property collects as many errors as possible that might occur during an operation, such as reading a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen feil samler inn så mange feil som mulig som kan oppstå under en operasjon, for eksempel lesing av en konfigurasjonsfil.

trans-unit.source: The exception thrown shows only the first error.
trans-unit.target: Det oppstod et unntak viser bare den første feilen.

trans-unit.source: You can access Errors to see all the errors issued.
trans-unit.target: Du har tilgang til feil for å se alle feilene som er utstedt.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> object that contains errors that identify the reasons this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.ICollection>objekt som inneholder feil som identifiserer årsakene dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the configuration file that caused this configuration exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter banen til konfigurasjonsfilen som forårsaket unntaket bli utløst denne konfigurasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The path to the configuration file that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Banen til konfigurasjonsfilen som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> til å bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the configuration file from which the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter banen til konfigurasjonsfilen som den interne <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet ble lastet inn når oppstod et konfigurasjonsunntak for denne.

trans-unit.source: The GetFilename method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object being parsed when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetFilename returnerer navnet på konfigurasjonsfilen som inneholder den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>objekt analysert da unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: The path to the configuration file from which the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object was loaded when this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Banen til konfigurasjonsfilen som den interne <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet ble lastet inn når oppstod et konfigurasjonsunntak for denne.

trans-unit.source: Gets the path to the configuration file that the internal <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> was reading when this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter banen til konfigurasjonsfilen som den interne <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>lesing når denne konfigurasjonsunntak ble registrert.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The GetFilename method returns the name of the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetFilename returnerer navnet på filen for konfigurasjon av <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet ble tilgang når unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The path of the configuration file the internal <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Banen til konfigurasjonen filen den interne <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet ble tilgang når unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object represented when this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter linjenummeret i konfigurasjonsfilen som den interne <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet som representeres når oppstod et konfigurasjonsunntak for denne.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A> method returns the name of the configuration file that contains the <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> object being parsed when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A>metoden returnerer navnet på konfigurasjonsfilen som inneholder den <xref:System.Xml.XmlNode>objekt analysert da unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.Xml.XmlNode> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException.GetFilename%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objektet som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.

trans-unit.source: The line number within the configuration file that contains the <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"></xref> object being parsed when this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Linjenummeret i konfigurasjonsfilen som inneholder den <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNode"> </xref> objekt analysert når oppstod et konfigurasjonsunntak for denne.

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number within the configuration file that the internal <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was processing when this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter linjenummeret i konfigurasjonsfilen som den interne <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet behandlet når oppstod et konfigurasjonsunntak for denne.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The GetLineNumber method returns the name of the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Metoden GetLineNumber returnerer navnet på filen for konfigurasjon av <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet ble tilgang når unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that caused this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet som forårsaket denne <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> unntak bli utløst.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The line number within the configuration file that the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object was accessing when the exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Linjenummeret i konfigurasjonen av filen som den <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objektet ble tilgang når unntaket oppstod.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> object with the file name and line number at which this configuration exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: Angir den <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> objektet med det navn og linje nummeret denne konfigurasjonsunntak oppstod under.

trans-unit.source: The GetObjectData method sets a <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object with the file name and line number at which this <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception occurred.
trans-unit.target: GetObjectData metoden angir en <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>objekt med navn og en linje nummer for som <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>unntak oppstod.</xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: During deserialization, the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException> exception is reconstituted from the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> object that is transmitted over the stream.
trans-unit.target: Under deserialisering, den <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>unntak reconstituted fra den <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>objekt som overføres via dataflyten.</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> </xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException>

trans-unit.source: The object that holds the information to be serialized.
trans-unit.target: Objektet som inneholder informasjon som skal serialiseres.

trans-unit.source: The contextual information about the source or destination.
trans-unit.target: Kontekstavhengig informasjon om kilden eller målet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number within the configuration file at which this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter linjenummeret i konfigurasjonsfilen som denne det oppstod et konfigurasjonsunntak.

trans-unit.source: The line number within the configuration file at which this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Linjenummeret i konfigurasjonsfilen for som <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.

trans-unit.source: Gets an extended description of why this configuration exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: Henter en utvidet beskrivelse av hvorfor denne konfigurasjonsunntak ble registrert.

trans-unit.source: An extended description of why this <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"></xref> exception was thrown.
trans-unit.target: En beskrivelse av hvorfor dette <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException"> </xref> oppstod et unntak.
